scalevar.aliasUp: fmax(scaleVariations[:, 0], fmax(scaleVariations[:, 1], fmax(scaleVariations[:, 2], fmax(scaleVariations[:, 3], fmax(scaleVariations[:, 4], scaleVariations[:, 5])))))
scalevar.aliasDown: fmin(scaleVariations[:, 0], fmin(scaleVariations[:, 1], fmin(scaleVariations[:, 2], fmin(scaleVariations[:, 3], fmin(scaleVariations[:, 4], scaleVariations[:, 5])))))
